p:
Australia is one of the countries that have an ecological reserve, which means that the biocapacity is higher than the ecological footprint. However, the country’s biocapacity declined rapidly in the studied period, while the ecological footprint largely followed a constant trend. Per person biocapacity and ecological footprint in Australia for the study period can be seen in Fig. 3.Fig. 3
The biocapacity and ecological footprint per person in Australia over 1990–2017
